Package main.models

Class Book

java.lang.Object
main.models.Book
public class Book extends Object
Represents an instance of book.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Book(String title, String authors, String isbn)
    Constructs a new Book instance with the specified title, authors, and ISBN.

    Constructs a new Book instance with the specified details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String authors, String isbn, String dateBorrow, String dateGB) throws SQLException
      Constructs a new Book instance with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the book
      authors - the authors of the book
      isbn - the International Standard Book Number (ISBN) of the book
      dateBorrow - the date the book was borrowed
      dateGB - the date the book is to be returned (date de grande bibliotheque)
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error accessing the database to retrieve stock information

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String authors, String isbn)
      Constructs a new Book instance with the specified title, authors, and ISBN. The stock is initialized to 10 by default.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the book
      authors - the authors of the book
      isbn - the International Standard Book Number (ISBN) of the book
